hero.title: About Telyx.ai
hero.subtitle: Transforming customer service with artificial intelligence

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Telyx.ai was founded to transform customer service for small and medium-sized businesses with artificial intelligence. We believe that SMBs should be able to provide the same quality customer experience as large enterprises.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To enable every business to provide 24/7 professional customer service.

whyTurkey.title: Why Turkey?
whyTurkey.content: Turkey's dynamic SMB ecosystem, openness to innovative solutions, and need for digital transformation make it an ideal market to start. After proving ourselves in Turkey, we aim to expand to global markets.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: As a small but passionate team, we work every day to improve the customer experience of businesses.

cta.title: Join Us
cta.subtitle: Apply for early access and discover the power of AI-powered customer service.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Telyx.ai

faq.a1: Telyx.ai is a platform that enables businesses to automatically respond to customer requests from phone, WhatsApp, chat, and email channels using artificial intelligence.
faq.a2: We support phone (AI voice response), WhatsApp Business, web chat widget, and email channels.
faq.a3: Basic setup can be completed within 10 minutes. You can start using your assistant immediately after creating it.
faq.q4: Which languages do you support besides English?
faq.a4: We support 16 different languages: Turkish, English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Hindi, Dutch, Polish, and Swedish.
faq.q5: Does it integrate with my e-commerce site?
faq.a5: Yes, we integrate with ikas, Ticimax, Ideasoft, and Shopify. Your customers can check their order status.
faq.a6: We operate on a monthly subscription model. Visit our pricing page for details.
faq.a7: We are currently in early access. You can get priority access by signing up for the waitlist.
faq.a8: Yes, all data is stored encrypted and processed in compliance with GDPR.
faq.a9: You can reach us at info@telyx.ai.

contact.title: Have Another Question?
contact.text: Send us an email and we'll get back to you shortly.

apiDocs.title: API Documentation
apiDocs.comingSoon: Our API documentation will be published soon.

dataCollected.title: Data Collected
dataCollected.content:
When using our services, we collect the following data:
 Identity information (name, email address)
 Contact information (phone number, address)
 Usage data (page views, clicks)
 Device information (IP address, browser type)

dataUsage.title: Purpose of Data Usage
dataUsage.content:
Collected data is used for the following purposes:
 Service delivery and improvement
 Providing customer support
 Communication and notifications
 Fulfilling legal obligations

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.content:
Your data:
 Is stored encrypted on secure servers
 Is kept only for the necessary duration
 Is protected with industry-standard security measures

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Sharing
thirdParty.content:
Your data may be shared in the following cases:
 Service providers (payment processors, infrastructure providers)
 Legal requirements and court orders
 Other third parties with your consent

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content:
We use the following cookies on our website:
 Session cookies (login status)
 Analytics cookies (site usage)
 Preference cookies (language selection)

userRights.title: User Rights (GDPR)
userRights.content:
Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
 Right to be informed about your data
 Right to request correction of inaccurate data
 Right to request deletion of your data
 Right to object to data processing
 Right to data portability

contact.title: Contact
contact.content:
For questions about our privacy policy:
Email: info@telyx.ai

serviceDefinition.title: Service Definition
serviceDefinition.content: Telyx.ai is a SaaS (Software as a Service) product that provides businesses with an AI-powered customer service platform. The platform automatically responds to customer requests from phone, WhatsApp, chat, and email channels.

accountCreation.title: Account Creation
accountCreation.content:
To use our service:
 You must provide accurate and current information
 You are responsible for account security
 You must keep your password confidential
 You must report unauthorized access immediately

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content:
When using our service:
 You must use it for legal purposes
 Spam or abuse is prohibited
 You must not violate others' rights
 You must not attempt to bypass security measures

paymentTerms.title: Payment Terms
paymentTerms.content:
Payment terms:
 Monthly or annual subscription options are available
 Payments are automatically renewed
 Cancellation takes effect from the next billing period
 Our refund policy is valid within 14 days

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content:
The platform and all content belong to Telyx.ai
 Users retain rights to content they upload
 Platform license is for personal/commercial use
 Reverse engineering is prohibited

liability.title: Liability Limitations
liability.content:
Telyx.ai:
 Does not guarantee against service interruptions
 Is not responsible for indirect damages
 Maximum liability is limited to subscription fees paid
 Is not responsible for third-party integrations

termination.title: Termination
termination.content:
Account closure:
 You can close your account at any time
 Your account may be suspended for violations
 Your data is deleted within 30 days after closure
 Necessary data may be retained for legal obligations

changes.title: Changes
changes.content:
These terms of service:
 May be updated with prior notice
 Important changes are notified via email
 Continued use means acceptance

contact.title: Contact
contact.content:
For questions about terms of service:
Email: info@telyx.ai
